Exciting Opportunities at Intuit - Bangalore! 🚀

Join our dynamic tech teams at Intuit! We are seeking talented individuals for the following roles:

- Software Engineer II: Java with exposure to Golang, Springboot, Microservices, CI/CD, and AWS/Azure/GCP.  
- Senior Software Engineer: Proficient in Java and React.  
- Salesforce Developer (4-6Yrs)  
- Senior Software Engineer: Java with AWS and data background.  
- Senior Software Engineer: Java+React with AWS cloud and Data Engineering.  
- Senior Software Engineer: Python + Java, Springboot, Microservices, CI/CD, AWS/Azure/GCP.  

If you have the relevant hands-on experience for any of the above positions and are interested in exploring these opportunities, we'd love to hear from you!

Send your updated profile to shalini_mohan@intuit.com.

#Intuit #TechJobs #Bangalore #SSE #SoftwareEngineer #SeniorSoftwareEngineer #Java #React #Salesforce #Fullstack #Backend #Hiring #Hybrid #python #AWS #cloud

👥🤝 Ridam Hazra and 654 others
